game_description: Blockworks is a creative VR sandbox. Express your full creativity and build anything your mind can imagine! Classic Mode Follow instructions and build from built-in sets and hundreds of workshop submissions. Build one page at the time. Sandbox Mode The only limit is your imagination. All blocks and all materials are at your disposal. You can save your block creations in the library or share them on the game workshop. Endless Mode No longer limited by table size, you have an infinite area to build on. Place the blocks on the studs in the ground. Content ‚óè 100s of block types ‚óè 30 materials ‚óè 5 build-in sets ‚óè 4 environments ‚óè 100s of workshop builds Gameplay - use you virtual hands to grab and manipulate blocks. When blocks are close enough each other a blue preview will show up. Dropped block will instantly connect to the other block. Help blocks are highlighted, when the disconnect button is hit, the highlighted block is separated from the rest of the group. The game features lot of buttons and gizmos that have good feeling feedback. There is no UI in the game. Join our official Discord for more fun outside the game!
review_1: This game is HUGELY underpriced. they have lots of different bricks, settings and builds to enjoy! Don't spend a ton of money on lego, GET THIS GAME! Its cheap, good and fun! this is one of the only games I havent bought and refunded before the 2 hours, it was just that good!
review_2: Honestly a wonderful game, instead of going out and spending a lot of money on like Lego sets I can instead spend 300 dollars on a headset to do it at home‚Ä¶ but anyway this game is worth the money and it isn‚Äôt much anyway 10/10 game üëç
review_3: I won a giveaway from NotTaughtfunny and I had so much fun with it. If you have an oculus but no money for real legos, this is your best option for playing with legos. Although I have some suggestions, maybe add a hand/arm brick for little figs to hold things? Maybe add little swords or small guns for them to hold
review_4: One of the best games to play if you are a lego fan. You can get the game for free if you win their weekly giveaways on tiktok! I'd say if you dont win buy the game because it's that good!
